channel.title: CVE Feed for Andy Moyle -- Church Admin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Andy Moyle -- Church Admin

item.title: CVE-2023-30782|2024-09-25T15:02:03.688Z -- andy%20moyle -- church%20admin
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Andy Moyle Church Admin plugin <=Â 3.7.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32090|2024-08-21T17:33:24.486Z -- andy%20moyle -- church%20admin
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Andy Moyle Church Admin.This issue affects Church Admin: from n/a through 4.0.27.

item.title: CVE-2024-35764|2024-08-02T03:14:54.084Z -- andy%20moyle -- church%20admin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Andy Moyle Church Admin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Church Admin: from n/a through 4.4.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-37418|2024-08-02T03:57:39.408Z -- andy%20moyle -- church%20admin
